name: Romanian Apple Cake
author: RAVRAM
summary: This is a wonderfully simple, yet delicious cake!  It is so moist and fresh, it will surely be a favorite with your family, just like it is with mine! The main length of the preparation time is cutting and peeling the apples. A mixture of apples works great, although I usually use Golden Delicious.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan
Cut the apples into 1 inch wedges
In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and sugar until blended
Mix in the baking soda, oil, cinnamon and vanilla
Stir in the flour, just until incorporated
Fold in the apples and walnuts
Bake in the preheated oven for 55 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
May be served warm or at room temperature
